Manage Your Projects Anywhere with Structure Mobile

Our mobile app lets you quickly and easily manage your work time right from your mobile device. Through the app you can enter, review, and edit both billable and non-charge time entries. Plus, it seamlessly ties into all the other features of the main Structure software.
